mapper.select: select c.cidx, c.cImage, c.cSubject, c.cPrice from POLY_BASKET ba, POLY_CONTENTS c where c.cidx=ba.cidx and ba.midx=#{midx}
mapper.delete: delete from POLY_BASKET where midx=#{0} and cidx=#{1}
mapper.select: select count(*) from POLY_WISHLIST where midx=#{0} and cidx=#{1}
select c.cidx, c.cImage from POLY_WISHLIST w, POLY_CONTENTS c where c.cidx = w.cidx and w.midx=#{midx}
mapper.delete: delete from POLY_WISHLIST where midx=#{midx} and cidx=#{cidx}
mapper.select: select o.cidx, c.cImage from POLY_ORDER o, POLY_PAY p, POLY_CONTENTS c where o.oId = p.oid and c.cidx = o.cidx and p.pStatus='Y' and o.midx=#{midx}
select o.oid, p.pMethod, p.pPrice, p.pStatus, o.oWriteday from POLY_ORDER o, POLY_PAY p where o.oId = p.oid and o.midx=#{midx} order by o.oWriteday desc
